salesYearOneD=CalcFutureAmount(salesYearOneHeadD, salesGrowth PercentD, 0.00) salesYearTwoD=CalcFutureAmount(sales YearOneHeadD, salesGrowth PercentD, 1.00) salesYearThreeD=CalcFutureAmount(sales YearOneD, salesGrowthPercentD, 2.00)

COSYearTwoD=(sales YearTwo D* (ForecastCOSPercentD/ 100))
COSYearThreeD=(sales YearThree D*(ForecastCOSPercentD/ 100))
gross ProfitYearOneD=(salesYearOneD-coSYearOneD) grossProfitYearTwoD= (salesYearTwoD-COSYearTwoD) grossProfitYearThreeD=(salesYearThreeD-COSYearThreeD) expenses YearOneD= (CalcFutureAmount(expen sesYearOneHeadD, expenses Growth PercentD, 0.00)) expensesYearTwoD= (CalcFutureAmount (expe nsesYearOneHeadD, expenses Growth PercentD, 1.00)

CalcFutureAmount Function:
int CalcFutureAmount(Double StartAmount, double AnnualInterest, double Years){
int FutureAmountl 0
double FutureAmountD = 0.00
double Decimallnterest =
Annuallnterest/100n FutureAmountD =
StartAmount (Math.pow(1+DecimalInterest), Years))
 FutureAmountl = (int)FutureAmountD
return FutureAmountl
}

interestPerMonth D = (interestPercentD / 1200)
monthlyRepayD = (interestPerMonthD * IoanAmountD)/ (1-(Math.pow (1 + interest PerMonthD), (-1* monthsTo RepayD))) totalRepayD = (monthlyRepayD * monthsToRepayD)

salesNetD (salesPriceD - (sales PriceD - (salesPriceD/(1 +(vatPercentD) / 100)))
grossProfitD = (salesNetD - costPriceD)
markupPercentD ((sales NetD - costPriceD) / costPriceD) *100)
marginPercentD (salesNetD - costPriceD) / salesNetD)* 100

Informed by:
http://www.investopedia.com/ask/answers/102714/whats -difference-between-profit-margin-and-markup.asp

salesNetPriceD (costPriceD + (costPriceD* (markupPercentD/ 100))
vatD salesNetPriceD * (vatPercentD/100)
marginPercentD (salesNetPriceD - costPriceD) salesNetPriceD) * 100
grossProfitPercentD = (salesNetPriceD - costPriceD)
salesGrossPriceD (salesNetPriceD + vatD) Informed by:
http://www.investopedia.com/ask/answers/102714/whats -difference-between-profit-margin-and-markup.asp

grossProfitD = salesD - costOfSalesD
grossProfitPercentD = (grossProfitD/ salesD) * 100
expensesTotalD = expensesD +depreciationD + interestChargesD
operatingProfitD (grossProfitD - (expensesD + depreciationD))
 operatingProfitPercentD (operatingProfitD / salesD) * 100
netProfitD = grossProfitD expenses TotalD
netProfitPercentD (netProfitD / salesD) * 100
cashGenerationD = (grossProfitD expensesD)
breakevenSalesD = (expensesTotalD / (grossProfitPercentD/ 100))
 breakevenSales PercentD = (breakevenSalesD / salesD) *100)
breakevenDays D = (breakevenSalesD/ (salesD / 365)
 Informed by:

http://www.investopedia.com/ask/answers/031015/what -difference-between-gross-profit-operating-profit-and-net -income.asp

vat1D ((salesNetPrice1D) * (vatPercent 1 D/ 100);
salesGrossPrice1 D = salesNetPrice1D + vat1D

vat2D ((salesGrossPrice2D - (sales Gross Price2D / (1+(vatPercent2D/ 100))))
salesNetPrice2D = salesGrossPrice2D - vat2D

https://www.gov.uk/vat-businesses/inclusive-exclusive prices

stage1Convert PercentD= (salesstage1D/salesstage1D)*100
 stage2ConvertPercentD= (salesstage2D/salesstage1 D)*100
 stage3Convert PercentD= (salesstage3D/salesstage 1D)*100
 stage4Convert PercentD= (salesstage4D/salesstage1 D)*100
 actualBuyersConvert PercentD= (actualbuyers D/salesstage 1D)*100
 targetStage1D=(targetbuyersD/(actualBuyers Convert PercentD/100))
 targetStage2D= (targetStage1 D*(stage2ConvertPercentD/100))
 targetStage3D= (targetStage1 D (stage3Convert PercentD/100))
 targetStage4D= (targetStage1D*(stage4ConvertPercentD/100))
 targetBuyersCalcD=(targetStage1D*(actualBuyersConvertPercentD/100))
Informed by:
